Import libraries to be used
```{r }
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(GGally)
library(fastDummies)


```

Imports data and checks it

```{r}
avocado_data <- read.csv("data/avocado.csv") 

avocado_data %>% 
glimpse()

avocado_data %>% 
distinct(type)

```

Starts Data Wrangling

```{r}
avocado_data_trim <- avocado_data %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-date, -x, -region, -x4046, -x4225, -x4770, -total_bags)

avocado_data_trim %>% 
  glimpse
```

Starts creating model

```{r}
avocado_data_trim %>% 
distinct(region)

avocado_data_trim %>% 
  ggpairs(aes(colour = type))
```
